metadata.name: Colorful Hope
metadata.description:
A good Hope is all that she have,  
assuring about good days ahead..  
Hope to fill self with colorful thoughts,  
radiating happy vibes around..  
Hope that emits the fragrance of success,  
to bloom the confidence within..  
Hope that brightens the horizon,  
greeting along with warm wishes..   
Hope is her best friend,  
whispering to try again in times of despair..  
Hope as good as rainbow,  
aspiring endless dreams..

Colorful hopes  is an illustration created using digital alcohol ink art in Procreate incorporating elements of AI and represents the rainbow shades of positivity radiated when hopes and aspirations are aligned in true direction.
